document.discussion_title: BNP Paribas Reiterates Neutral Rating for Bunzl plc (BNZL)
document.topic_text: Tweet Bunzl plc (LON:BNZL) ‘s stock had its “neutral” rating restated by analysts at BNP Paribas in a research report issued on Monday. They presently have a GBX 2,350 ($30.26) price objective on the stock. BNP Paribas’ target price points to a potential downside of 2.25% from the company’s previous close. In other Bunzl plc news, insider Hussey,Paul Nicholas sold 14,000 shares of the firm’s stock in a transaction dated Thursday, June 30th. The stock was sold at an average price of GBX 2,261 ($29.11), for a total value of £316,540 ($407,597.22). Also, insider May,Brian acquired 27,500 shares of the business’s stock in a transaction on Wednesday, June 29th. The stock was bought at an average cost of GBX 1,240 ($15.97) per share, for a total transaction of £341,000 ($439,093.48). BNZL has been the topic of a number of other research reports. Canaccord Genuity increased their target price on Bunzl plc from GBX 1,930 ($24.85) to GBX 2,200 ($28.33) and gave the company a “hold” rating in a report on Monday, July 4th. Deutsche Bank AG increased their target price on Bunzl plc from GBX 2,100 ($27.04) to GBX 2,520 ($32.45) and gave the company a “buy” rating in a report on Tuesday, August 9th. Shore Capital reiterated a “hold” rating on shares of Bunzl plc in a report on Tuesday, August 9th. Royal Bank Of Canada reiterated an “underperform” rating and set a GBX 1,700 ($21.89) target price on shares of Bunzl plc in a report on Thursday, June 30th. Finally, Citigroup Inc. reiterated a “buy” rating and set a GBX 2,200 ($28.33) target price on shares of Bunzl plc in a report on Friday, May 6th. One analyst has rated the stock with a sell rating, eleven have issued a hold rating and five have assigned a buy rating to the stock. The stock has an average rating of “Hold” and a consensus target price of GBX 2,147.80 ($27.66). //www.americanbankingnews.com/2016/08/22/bnp-paribas-reiterates-neutral-rating-for-bunzl-plc-bnzl/ Bunzl plc ( LON:BNZL ) opened at 2412.00 on Monday. The company’s 50-day moving average price is GBX 2,361.17 and its 200 day moving average price is GBX 2,095.35. The firm’s market capitalization is GBX 7.93 billion. Bunzl plc has a 1-year low of GBX 1,665.00 and a 1-year high of GBX 2,440.00. Bunzl plc is engaged in the distribution and outsourcing service. The Company supplies a range of sourced non-food products to a range of market sectors in approximately 30 countries. The Company’s segments include North America, Continental Europe, the United Kingdom & Ireland, and Rest of the World. Receive News &Ratings for Bunzl plc Bunzl plc
